description: Visit websites and leave a message on their Intercom chat

defaultArgument.message: Hello! I stumbled on your site and was wondering if...

outputDescription.message: Text delivered to the Intercome operator
outputDescription.sendAt: Actual page the message was delivered on
outputDescription.status: Whether the message's been delivered or not

spreadsheetUrl.label: Which domains do you wish to target? (?)
helpers: Enter either the URL of 1 website that's using Intercom. OR the URL of a Google Spreadsheet URL filled with websites' URLs
When using a spreadsheet/CSV URL, make sure your file is publicly available so Phantombuster can connect to it.

columnName.label: [optional] Name of the column containing your URLs (?)
columnName.helper: By default, we'll use the first column of your spreadsheet.

message.label: Specify here the message you want to deliver to the person behind Intercom (?)
message.helper: Use #test# to insert the test value from your CSV file Other tags are available.

email.label: Specify here the email you want the operator to contact you back on (?)
email.helper: This email will be filled into Intercom and as soon as the operator send you an answer you'll be notified by email.

profilesPerLaunch.label: How many websites do you want to process per launch? (Maximum 10)
profilesPerLaunch.helper: Make sure that you can handle the flow of responses!

triesPerDomain.label: If Intercom doesn't open on the main domain, how many other pages do you wish to visit?
triesPerDomain.helper: Sometimes the root page won't show Intercom but browsing to /pricing or /help will give you an entry point into Intercom.

csvName.label: Specify here the name of the files containing launches' results
